name: Sputnik 11
description:
In Sputnik 11 you play as an armadillo that was shot into Space by the USSR. The Game is a fast-paced shooter with heavy emphasis on movement. Combine a jump pack and your ability to bounce off walls to reach the end of the level as fast as you can. Challenge yourself and your friends in a race against time to beat each other’s highscores.

This project was made during my first year of my games engineering studies in Würzburg. It's a collaboration with a fellow student.
